trans-unit.source: Specifies that an attached property is only browsable on an element that also has another specific [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] applied to its class definition.

The meaning of the term `browsable` as used in descriptions for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is analogous to the descriptions given for <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>, but the browsable state for an attached property is particularly relevant to property information for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], because an attached property is primarily a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] concept.
This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] should only be applied on the get accessor of attached property definitions.
Do not apply this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] to the set accessor.

Although intuitively it is the set operation that is being made browsable for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] on relevant elements, it is the presence and characteristics of the get accessor on the property defining element that controls the true behavior.
For general information on declaring attached properties, see [Attached Properties Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"></xref> class.

The <xref:System.Type> of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] that must also be applied on a class in order for the attached property to be browsable on the class where <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"></xref> is applied..
Gets the type of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] that must also be applied on a class.

The AttributeType value can only be set through the `attributeType` parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] constructor.

Determines whether the current <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is equal to a specified object.

This implementation supports value equality of the one possible settable value exposed by this attribute, <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute.AttributeType%2A>.

The <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"></xref> to compare to the current <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Returns the hash code for this <xref href="System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

This implementation supports multiple possible hash values based on the one possible settable value exposed by this attribute, <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute.AttributeType%2A>.
